name: 扬-奥勒·格斯特
awards: 2019年 第54届卡罗维发利国际电影节 水晶地球仪奖 评委会特别奖 错会半生
2014年 第4届北京国际电影节 注目未来单元 最受注目影片 (提名) 啊，男孩
2013年 第26届欧洲电影奖 最佳影片 (提名) 啊，男孩
name_full: 扬-奥勒·格斯特 Jan-Ole Gerster
birth_place: 德国,北莱茵-威斯特法伦州,哈根
introduction: Born in 1978, the director began his film industry career in 2004 with various roles including as assistant to Wolfgang Becker on Good Bye, Lenin!. He then studied directing at the German Film and Television Academy Berlin (DFFB). His debut feature film A Coffee in Berlin was a breakout international success, screening at over 60 international festivals and winning awards including the German Film Award in Gold and the European Film Award for Best Debut Film. His second feature Lara premiered at Karlovy Vary, where it received awards including the Special Jury Prize, and was nominated for the German Film Award. Islands is his first film in English.
